instruction: Reorder the columns to be "Date", "First Name", "Last Name", "Order ID", "Sales"

minimal: `CLICK` the top letter tab to select the column "Date".
`MOUSE_DOWN` on the edge of the selection
`CLICK` the top letter tab to select the column "First Name".
`MOUSE_DOWN` on the edge of the selection
`CLICK` the top letter tab to select the column "Last Name".
`MOUSE_DOWN` on the edge of the selection
`CLICK` the top letter tab to select the column "Order ID".
`MOUSE_DOWN` on the edge of the selection
`CLICK` the top letter tab to select the column "Sales".
`MOUSE_DOWN` on the edge of the selection
